parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run, without performing the actual request. Valid values:

*   false (default): performs a dry run and performs the actual request.
*   true: performs only a dry run.

parameters.name: PolicyContent
parameters.description:
The document of the tag policy.

For more information about the syntax of a tag policy, see [Syntax of a tag policy](~~417436~~).

parameters.name: PolicyDesc
parameters.description:
The description of the tag policy.

The description must be 0 to 512 characters in length.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the tag policy.

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description:
The name of the tag policy.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Set the value to cn-shanghai.
